title: Ticket #7198: Schedd asserts after passing (null) as its public command port to shad
description:
LIGO reported their schedd crashed and restarted. Logs showed the schedd asserted with shadow exited with incorrect usage

after the shadow returned JOB_SHADOW_USAGE

and logged 

08/06/19 14:55:30 ERROR: invalid public schedd_addr specified: --schedd=(null)
08/06/19 14:55:30 Usage: condor_shadow cluster.proc schedd_addr file_name
08/06/19 14:55:30 argv[0] = condor_shadow
08/06/19 14:55:30 argv[1] = 37268058.0
08/06/19 14:55:30 argv[2] = --reconnect
08/06/19 14:55:30 argv[3] = --schedd=(null)
08/06/19 14:55:30 argv[4] = --xfer-queue=limit=upload,download;addr=<10.14.0.52:16411>
08/06/19 14:55:30 argv[5] = <10.14.0.52:16411>
08/06/19 14:55:30 argv[6] = -

Also note at this time the SPOOL directory was full, and the schedd was logging a lot of disk full errors. Things seemed to get better after the schedd restart.
